page.title: 07CUTNALL GREEN (SQ.8)
page.content:
{Cutnall Green}is the main centre of population in the area . There are something over sixty dwellings and a {Post Office,}( doubling up as a small supermarket ), three farms very close to the village centre , three public houses and a primary school. This has at present just 38 children - perhaps there is a danger of closure . The suggestion has been made!
The public houses are thriving mainly on passing trade - much of it for food as well as drink ! But the filling station has now closed , although the {heavy vehicle repair shop}remains.
